name: Feraligatr ex
author: Hikaru Koike

poke_body.name: Overpowering Fang
poke_body.effect: As long as Feraligatr ex is your Active Pokémon, each player’s Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) can’t use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sore Spot
attacks.effect: Does 70 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
